title: New: Two Bicycles – Moon Colours
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/bycycle.png "bycycle")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5200-new-two-bicycles-moon-colours/attachment/bycycle)

Announcing the forthcoming release of an entirely instrumental record, The Ocean, Two Bicycles premiered a third track set to feature on the concept album. Having already donated two tracks as free downloads, the beautiful “I’m Not Afraid To Wait For You” and the more upbeat “Alone at Sea”, there’s a feeling that Two Bicycles has a real belief in the quality of their music, and quite rightly so. “Moon Colours” is a placid affair, reverb laden guitar chords shimmer gracefully; an accomplished track, showing that The Ocean has the potential to be a truly fantastic record.

[Download Moon Colours](http://stadiumsandshrines.com/?p=3058)
